title: Little-Heaven
typeOfFood: Vegan, Pizza, Japanese, Organic, Western, Beer/Wine, Fusion
description: Must call to reserve at least 3+ days ahead as it's not always open. Upscale vegan restaurant minutes from Katabiranotsuji station on the Arashiyama line, or 10 minutes from Uzumasa station on Sanin line. Offers a lunch set consisting of seasonal vegetables of Kyoto, traditional dried soymilk skin, and wheat gluten. Has vegetable sushi course. Dessert costs extra.
